resources.string: Neuropsych Tool - BART-Y

WELCOME! 

 	To the game of 
 Balloon Analogue Risk Task For Youth
Click here to continue
\t\tWelcome to the Balloon Game! \n
For each pump you get rewarded in this game\n BUT REMEMBER\n balloons pops if you pump them up too much!!!
If a balloon pops, You will not get a reward\n You will have to wait for next balloon\n And try AGAIN!!
Some of these Balloons might pop after just one pump others might not pop Until they fill the entire screen
It is up to you to decide how much\n to pump up each of the 30 balloons
You can stop pumping at any time\n by clicking on the\n "FILL REWARD" button
When the game is over, you will be able to collect\n a prize which will depend on how high you\n reward meter is

There are four types of rewards you can earn
 a small prize, a medium prize, a big prize
 and a bonus prize
 Your meter will show you hoe closer you are
START THE BALLOON\n GAME WHEN YOU ARE READY!!!!
NEXT
In this game, you are asked to pump up 30 balloons
BACK
You pump up on the balloon by clicking on the "PUMP" button with your Mouse TRY IT!!!

Summary - You make $0.05 for each pump. - You save the money from a balloon when you click "Collect $$$". - You lose money from a balloon when it pops. - There are just 30 balloons. - You will be paid the exact amount you earned on the game. Start when you are ready
